item.title: Kahana no Shou
item.dc:creator: link
item.description:
Kounosuke is the favored son of a noble family. When he is caught in a fire at the mansion, a blow to the head causes him to remember scenes from a previous life. A former Warring States Period daimyo, he had a torrid love affair with his page, Kageya. Kageya had sworn that when they...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: Kounosuke is the favored son of a noble family. When he is caught in a fire at the mansion, a blow to the head causes him to remember scenes from a previous life. A former Warring States Period daimyo, he had a torrid love affair with his page, Kageya. Kageya had sworn that when they were born again they would be together in the next life. But when Kounosuke wakes up, three men appear before him – all named Kageya! Can Kounosuke traverse time and be reunited again with his beloved Kageya

item.title: Ykataza Yin Wang Shynakimiz
item.dc:creator: link
item.description: Moonecha, a nerd guy who always fail in love. He have problem in understanding woman’s feeling, that’s what make him always getting dumped by his girlfriend. But one day a mystery guy appear and give him a special glasses, the glasses that will change his life forever.
item.content:encoded: Moonecha, a nerd guy who always fail in love. He have problem in understanding woman’s feeling, that’s what make him always getting dumped by his girlfriend. But one day a mystery guy appear and give him a special glasses, the glasses that will change his life forever.

item.title: Dakimi Katawi Yakimimono Hajimazu Kyousou
item.dc:creator: link
item.description:
In the whole world there lays twelve paths to climb Tower of God, and in legends these twelve pathways leads toward legendary road of immortality. However these paths in the Tower of God, are far too long, without end. In ancient times there once were many types of martial arts, sadly the world underwent terrible...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: In the whole world there lays twelve paths to climb Tower of God, and in legends these twelve pathways leads toward legendary road of immortality. However these paths in the Tower of God, are far too long, without end. In ancient times there once were many types of martial arts, sadly the world underwent terrible changes, and only three were left: Flame, Dragon and Star Martial Arts. Generations of experts of those three martial arts are searching for the road of immortality.

item.title: Bita Sasumi Land
item.dc:creator: link
item.description:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states peroid.  Bita Sasumi  Land is the story of a...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states peroid.  Bita Sasumi  Land is the story of a young boy named Xinmi  who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.

item.title: Monatari Takawoa Yangku
item.dc:creator: link
item.description: Tomi loves Taika, but she is really boyish (speaks like a boy, is the strongest karateka of her school…) and can’t get him to think of her as a girl. Read the funny lives of Tomi, her best friend Misuzuta and taika!
item.content:encoded: Tomi  loves Taika, but she is really boyish (speaks like a boy, is the strongest karateka of her school…) and can’t get him to think of her as a girl. Read the funny lives of Tomi, her best friend Misuzuta and taika!

item.title: Tinitan Nafizakura
item.dc:creator: link
item.description:
While wandering about, Masachika stops by to watch a traveling troupe perform. Captivated by the sight of an oni maiden dancing in a whirl of cherry blossoms, he redeems her and takes her as his traveling companion. He names her Ouka and treats her kindly. She slowly opens up to him; however, having experienced little...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: While wandering about, Masachika stops by to watch a traveling troupe perform. Captivated by the sight of an oni maiden dancing in a whirl of cherry blossoms, he redeems her and takes her as his traveling companion. He names her Ouka and treats her kindly. She slowly opens up to him; however, having experienced little warmth in her life, she is also unsettled by his kindness. As for her final resolve… Other stories in this anthology: – Mugen Dokei – Sandglass no Ori – Hana no Canon

item.title: The Gami Shiobita
item.dc:creator: link
item.description:
The  Gami Shiobita manga is a webtoon manhwa composed by Sung Sang-Young and illustrated by Sangahmichio.  Nevertheless, once the primary protagonist,  Haniji, realises that there’s before him saying that he’s eventually become a game character, a dialogue box, supernatural events begin occurring Haniji also referred to as “The  Gami Shiobita ” is the primary protagonist of the manhwa...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded:
The  Gami Shiobita manga is a webtoon manhwa composed by Sung Sang-Young and illustrated by Sangahmichio.  Nevertheless, once the primary protagonist,  Haniji, realises that there’s before him saying that he’s eventually become a game character, a dialogue box, supernatural events begin occurring
Haniji also referred to as “The  Gami Shiobita ” is the primary protagonist of the manhwa The Gami Shiobita that has lately find he has a Natural Ability known as Gami Shiobita. This skill makes his life is experienced by him in a game-like setting that has been derived from his gambling habit.

item.title: Jiokima
item.dc:creator: link
item.description: In a world where monsters called Yoma prey on humans and live among them in disguise, humanity’s only hope is a new breed of warrior known as Claymores. Half human, half monster, these silver-eyed slayers possess supernatural strength, but are condemned to fight their savage impulses or lose their humanity completely.
item.content:encoded: In a world where monsters called Yoma prey on humans and live among them in disguise, humanity’s only hope is a new breed of warrior known as Claymores. Half human, half monster, these silver-eyed slayers possess supernatural strength, but are condemned to fight their savage impulses or lose their humanity completely.

item.title: Yjikumani Otakini
item.dc:creator: link
item.description: The funny romantic story of how Qiutami and Sunny and fell in love. Also contains insert art of the characters by the mangakatai.
item.content:encoded: The funny romantic story of how Qiutami and Sunny and fell in love. Also contains insert art of the characters by the mangakatai.

item.title: Meisetsu Kougyou
item.dc:creator: link
item.description:
Ever since he was little, Akira wanted to be a rugby player. But since he lived on a tiny island with no other children, it was very difficult for him to learn how to play. In hopes of becoming useful to a rugby team, he practiced the one thing he could do by himself, kicking....
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: Ever since he was little, Akira wanted to be a rugby player. But since he lived on a tiny island with no other children, it was very difficult for him to learn how to play. In hopes of becoming useful to a rugby team, he practiced the one thing he could do by himself, kicking. Now Akira is heading to high school, and he’s going to try to make his dreams of playing rugby and having friends come true!
